## ðŸ“Œ Context

Please clearly describe the context of your question.

- What are you trying to achieve?
- Which tool or feature are you using?
- What is your environment? (macOS version, app version, etc.)

Providing detailed context helps us assist you faster and more accurately.

---

## â“ Your Question

Describe your question clearly and specifically.

Avoid general questions like:
> "It doesn't work."

Instead, explain:
- What you expected
- What actually happened
